title: Hypixel服务器官网发布信息翻译[四月份]
author: YZH20011356810
txt_content:
本帖最后由 YZH20011356810 于 2014-5-1 09:55 编辑 

[有连接问题？]
Having Connection Issues?       4月25日来自AgentK在10：28上午发布
我们正在调查关于连接的问题，向我们反馈，尝试下列方法，以得到帮助解决各种无法连接的问题。
We're investigating the cause of various connection issues that are being reported to us, but here's some things you can do to help:


1.先尝试重启你的电脑。很多时候，无法连接到服务器都是因为被什么东西破坏了家庭网络造成的。
2.尝试重启你的路由器。你的电脑通过它连接到互联网，它可以间接影响一些流量。
3.尝试从不同的网络中连接服务器。有时候，网络服务商阻止某些视频游戏的连接，因为他们不希望有额外的压力。去你朋友的房间，如果可以的话。


如果这些帮助没用，请发送邮件至support@hypixel.net，要包括你的游戏ID，IP地址（在这里查询http://whatismyipaddress.com/），你的操作系统，运行的Minecraft版本，包括主题为“连接问题Connection Issues”，并：


    ·如果你使用PC（windows），打开”命令提示符“并输入'tracert mc.hypixel.net'.复制截图至邮件中。
    ·如果你使用Linux或者Mac，打开“终端”并输入 'traceroute mc.hypixel.net'复制截图至邮件中


traceroute可以帮助我们确定是不是有更大的问题，像一个网络服务商关闭。我会去访问他们每个人，并设法解决这些问题。但是这取决于有多少得到帮助的人。我不能回复全部人。在接下来的几小时/天内，拥有这个问题的人可能会自动解决，请自动解决的人发邮件给我，内容为告诉我它可以运作了。







We're investigating the cause of various connection issues that are being reported to us, but here's some things you can do to help:

Try rebooting your computer first. Often times, players' issues connecting to the server are caused by something on their own home network, such as their own computer.Try rebooting your router. Your router/modem connects your house to the internet, and if it's having issues, it can intermittently block certain traffic.Try running Minecraft from a different internet connection. Sometimes internet providers block certain video game connections because they don't like the extra strain on their network, so try from a friend's house if possible
If none of these help, please email us at support@hypixel.net. Include your in-game name, your IP address (the big blue text onhttp://whatismyipaddress.com/ ), the operating system you are running, the Minecraft version you are running, include "Connection Issues" in the subject, and:
If you're on a PC, open 'Command Prompt' and type 'tracert mc.hypixel.net'. Copy-paste or screenshot the output of that, and include it in the email.If you're on Linux or a Mac, open 'Terminal' and type 'traceroute mc.hypixel.net'. Copy-paste the output of that, and include it in the email.
The traceroute should help me to determine if it's caused by something larger, like an internet provider being down, or if it's something on our end. I'll investigate each one of them and try to fix them, but, depending on how many I get, I may not be able to reply to all of them. Keep trying to connect for the next few hours/days after that, as the issue may resolve itself. If it spontaneously starts working again, please reply to the email you sent and say that it spontaneously started working again.

[大厅平衡人数更新记录]
Lobby Balancer Changelog    4月23日来自codename_B在下午7：52分发布
新闻：我在刚刚已经完成了一次关于玩家加入大厅的修改，而你大概甚至还不知道。
News: I've just completed a rework of how players join lobbies, and you probably didn't even notice it!


在之前，当玩家进入大厅时会自动随机进入一个适合的房间，在玩家活跃时可以让各个大厅人数平衡。但是在宁静时（因为常常在夜间），他可以因为孤独切换到另外的大厅。
Previously, when players joined lobbies it would pick one of the available ones at random, which at peak times resulted in a decent player balance but when things get quiet (as they tend to at night) it can leave the place feeling a little lonely.
这个机制是这样运作的，至你们中的有一些技术思想的人。在此之前我们通过全部列表到我们的BungeeCord服务器，但是现在我们的技术升级了，基于右边的“魔法评判”来进行计算。
How does this work, for those of you who're a little more technically minded, well previously we just passed the whole list of lobbies to our BungeeCord servers from the config files, but now we go ahead and calculate based on a "magic value" the right number of lobbies to have available.

代码
Q: We have 7 TNT lobbies, how many should we use? A: [{name=tntlobby1,type=TNTGames}, {name=tntlobby2,type=TNTGames}, {name=tntlobby3,type=TNTGames}, {name=tntlobby4,type=TNTGames}, {name=tntlobby5,type=TNTGames}]

这将意味这我们有更多的朋友，快乐，与伴侣。即使在深夜也是这样。
What this means is more friends, more fun, and more company, even in the late hours of the night!

[竞技场更新记录]
Arena Changelog                          4月22日来自Cryptkeeper在晚上9：52发布
新闻：对不起，最近没有变化。从现在开始，我们会寻找一个代言者在每个星期或2个星期（视变化内容而定）传播最近的更新记录来帮助，保持你们对最近新闻的了解和更新。谢谢！
News: Sorry for the lack of changelogs lately, from now on I'm looking to post one every week or two (depending on the content) about recent changes made to games to help keep you guys in the loop and help is hear suggestions on the latest changes. Thanks!
竞技场更新记录
Arena Changelog (4/22/14)
 技能：
    公牛冲击
        ·将冷却时间从30秒更改至40秒。
    生命之树
        ·将冷却时间从30秒更改至40秒。
        ·增加持续时间从6秒到7秒。
    圣水
        ·降低给附近队友的治疗量为50而不是100。
    雷击
        ·增加伤害从150到165。
    生命吸收
        ·从100降至每次攻击吸血量到60。
        ·加最多攻击8到12次。
        ·加持续时间从6秒到9秒。
     雪球
         ·增加伤害从50到55。
     盾墙
         ·减少伤害为50%，而不是原来的60%。
     愤怒
         ·现在为速度II效果，而不是原来的速度I。
      能源
          ·新增一个“魔法钥匙”能源。
          ·10%的几率生成，每场比赛只生成一次。
          ·如上


帽子：
    找到一个帽子的几率增加一倍。
    添加了超过10个帽子，其中包括一个史诗的！


修复：
    轻微的判断等级问题，一个玩家不能攻击任何东西。
    重生时效果不能去除


Skills
Bull Charge
Increased cooldown to 40 seconds from 30 seconds.
Tree of Life
Increased cooldown to 40 seconds from 30 seconds.
Holy Water
Decreased heal amount for nearby teammates to 50 instead of 100.
Lighting Strike
Increased damage from 150 to 165.
Life Leech
Decreased the heal amount per hit to 60 from 100.Increased max hits to 12 from 8.Increased duration from 6 seconds to 9 seconds.
Snowball
Increased damage from 50 to 55.
Tree of Life
Increased duration from 6 seconds to 7 seconds.
Shield Wall
Decreased damage reduction to 50% instead of 60%.
Berserk
Now gives you Speed II instead of Speed I.

Powerups
Added "Magical Key" powerup.
Gives you one "Magical Key" when activated.10% chance of spawning, only spawns once per match.See above!

Hats
Doubled chance of finding a hat.Added over 10 new hats, including new "EPIC" ones!
Fixes
Minor rating issues when a player doesn't damage anyone.Effects sometimes not removing on respawn.

更多重量级的东西会出现在竞技场！
Tons more coming soon to Arena!

[钱币箱！]
Coins Chest!
                     4月15号 来自Hypixel下午6:13发布




图片内容：
    Coin Chest-Click Me
     钱币箱子-点击我！
     A coin chest has spawned!First one to find it gets 500 conins!
    一个钱币在之前生成了！第一个找到它的人会获得500钱币！

现在在玩闪电战时，你有几率会与遇见这样的箱子！
Now while playing blitz, you have a chance to encounter this chest ！
[1.7.6/1.7.7]                      4月9号  来自Hypixel下午5：36分发布
我们正在进行一次更新，让1.7.6与1.7.7的客户端能够连接到服务器。（1.6.2-1.7.7的客户端即将可以连接到服务器！）
不过Mojang的会议服务器今天非常不稳定。我们知道我们会有麻烦，所以在接下来的几小时内是1.7.6/1.7.7客户端可以对服务器进行一段时间的连接。
直到我们知道它很稳定时结束。
We are currently rolling out updates to allow 1.7.6 and 1.7.7 clients to connect to the server.
(1.6.2 to 1.7.7 will be able to connect!)

However, Mojang's sessions servers are so unstable today that we are having trouble to know if our patch is stable enough, so in the next few hours you might be able to connect with 1.7.6 and 1.7.7 for short period of times, until we know for sure that it's stable we won't go 100%.

编辑：1.6.2-1.7.7现在可以连接服务器！
编辑2：很明显这被封锁了，努力修复。
编辑3：人们现在可以再次使用1.7.6和1.7.7的客户端连接服务器。
编辑4：再打破一些东西......工作....
编辑5：1.7.8现在可以工作，但是有严重的破坏，请用1.7.5。
编辑6：1.7.8现在可以工作！请汇报漏洞！
谢谢你的理解！
edit: 1.6.2 to 1.7.7 can now log on the server!

edit#2: apparently it's being blocked, working on a fix

edit#3: people can now connect once again with 1.7.6 and 1.7.7

edit#4: 1.7.8 broke things again... working on it...

edit#5: 1.7.8 now works but severely broken, please use 1.7.5

edit#6: 1.7.8 now works please report bugs!

Thank you for your comprehension.
未完待续
